verses.verse: וְאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> now these תֹּלְד֥וֹת <WH8435> Now these [are] the generations עֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> of Esau ה֥וּא <WH1931> he אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> who [is] Edom

עֵשָׂ֛ו <WH6215> Esau לָקַ֥ח <WH3947> took אֶת־ <WH853> נָשָׁ֖יו <WH802> his wives מִבְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> of the daughters כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan אֶת־ <WH853> עָדָ֗ה <WH5711> Adah בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter אֵילוֹן֙ <WH356> of Elon הַֽחִתִּ֔י <WH2850> the Hittite וְאֶת־ <WH853> אָהֳלִֽיבָמָה֙ <WH173> and Aholibamah בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter עֲנָ֔ה <WH6034> of Anah בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter צִבְע֖וֹן <WH6649> of Zibeon הַֽחִוִּֽי׃ <WH2340> the Hivite
וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּשְׂמַ֥ת <WH1315> And Bashemath בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter יִשְׁמָעֵ֖אל <WH3458> Ishmael's אֲח֥וֹת <WH269> sister נְבָיֽוֹת׃ <WH5032> of Nebajoth

וַתֵּ֧לֶד <WH3205> bare עָדָ֛ה <WH5711> And Adah לְעֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> to Esau אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלִיפָ֑ז <WH464> Eliphaz וּבָ֣שְׂמַ֔ת <WH1315> and Bashemath יָלְדָ֖ה <WH3205> bare אֶת־ <WH853> רְעוּאֵֽל׃ <WH7467> Reuel

וְאָהֳלִֽיבָמָה֙ <WH173> And Aholibamah יָֽלְדָ֔ה <WH3205> bare אֶת־ <WH853> [יעישׁ כ] (יְע֥וּשׁ <WH3266> Jehush ק) וְאֶת־ <WH853> יַעְלָ֖ם <WH3281> and Jaalam וְאֶת־ <WH853> קֹ֑רַח <WH7141> and Korah אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> these [are] the sons עֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> of Esau אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יֻלְּדוּ־ <WH3205> which were born ל֖וֹ בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> unto him in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took עֵשָׂ֡ו <WH6215> And Esau אֶת־ <WH853> נָ֠שָׁיו <WH802> his wives וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֣יו <WH1121> and his sons וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֹתָיו֮ <WH1323> and his daughters וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all נַפְשׁ֣וֹת <WH5315> and all the persons בֵּיתוֹ֒ <WH1004> of his house וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִקְנֵ֣הוּ <WH4735> and his cattle וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all בְּהֶמְתּ֗וֹ <WH929> and all his beasts וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all קִנְיָנ֔וֹ <WH7075> and all his substance אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which רָכַ֖שׁ <WH7408> which he had got בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> and went אֶל־ <WH413> about אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> into the country מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> from the face יַעֲקֹ֥ב <WH3290> Jacob אָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> of his brother

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָיָ֧ה <WH1961> had become רְכוּשָׁ֛ם <WH7399> For their riches רָ֖ב <WH7227> were more מִשֶּׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> than that they might dwell יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> together וְלֹ֨א <WH3808> not יָֽכְלָ֜ה <WH3201> could אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> and the land מְגֽוּרֵיהֶם֙ <WH4033> wherein they were strangers לָשֵׂ֣את <WH5375> not bear אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> them because מִקְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4735> of their cattle
וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <WH3427> Thus dwelt עֵשָׂו֙ <WH6215> Esau בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> in mount שֵׂעִ֔יר <WH8165> Seir עֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> Esau ה֥וּא <WH1931> he אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> [is] Edom

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> These תֹּלְד֥וֹת <WH8435> And these [are] the generations עֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> of Esau אֲבִ֣י <WH1> the father אֱד֑וֹם <WH123> of the Edomites בְּהַ֖ר <WH2022> in mount שֵׂעִֽיר׃ <WH8165> Seir

אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These שְׁמ֣וֹת <WH8034> These [are] the names בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> sons עֵשָׂ֑ו <WH6215> of Esau's אֱלִיפַ֗ז <WH464> Eliphaz בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עָדָה֙ <WH5711> of Adah אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> the wife עֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> of Esau רְעוּאֵ֕ל <WH7467> Reuel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בָּשְׂמַ֖ת <WH1315> of Bashemath אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> the wife עֵשָֽׂו׃ <WH6215> of Esau

וַיִּהְי֖וּ <WH1961> become בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons אֱלִיפָ֑ז <WH464> of Eliphaz תֵּימָ֣ן <WH8487> were Teman אוֹמָ֔ר <WH201> Omar צְפ֥וֹ <WH6825> Zepho וְגַעְתָּ֖ם <WH1609> and Gatam וּקְנַֽז׃ <WH7073> and Kenaz

וְתִמְנַ֣ע ׀ <WH8555> And Timna הָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> become פִילֶ֗גֶשׁ <WH6370> was concubine לֶֽאֱלִיפַז֙ <WH464> to Eliphaz בֶּן־ <WH1121> son עֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> Esau's וַתֵּ֥לֶד <WH3205> and she bare לֶאֱלִיפַ֖ז <WH464> to Eliphaz אֶת־ <WH853> עֲמָלֵ֑ק <WH6002> Amalek אֵ֕לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> these [were] the sons עָדָ֖ה <WH5711> of Adah אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> wife עֵשָֽׂו׃ <WH6215> Esau's

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And these [are] the sons רְעוּאֵ֔ל <WH7467> of Reuel נַ֥חַת <WH5184> Nahath וָזֶ֖רַח <WH2226> and Zerah שַׁמָּ֣ה <WH8048> Shammah וּמִזָּ֑ה <WH4199> and Mizzah אֵ֣לֶּ֣ה <WH428> These הָי֔וּ <WH1961> become בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> these were the sons בָשְׂמַ֖ת <WH1315> of Bashemath אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> wife עֵשָֽׂו׃ <WH6215> Esau's

וְאֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These הָי֗וּ <WH1961> become בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> And these were the sons אָהֳלִיבָמָ֧ה <WH173> of Aholibamah בַת־ <WH1323> the daughter עֲנָ֛ה <WH6034> of Anah בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter צִבְע֖וֹן <WH6649> of Zibeon אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife עֵשָׂ֑ו <WH6215> Esau's וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> and she bare לְעֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> to Esau אֶת־ <WH853> [יעישׁ כ] (יְע֥וּשׁ <WH3266> Jehush ק) וְאֶת־ <WH853> יַעְלָ֖ם <WH3281> and Jaalam וְאֶת־ <WH853> קֹֽרַח׃ <WH7141> and Korah

אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These אַלּוּפֵ֣י <WH441> These [were] dukes בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the sons עֵשָׂ֑ו <WH6215> of Esau בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> the sons אֱלִיפַז֙ <WH464> of Eliphaz בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> the firstborn עֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> [son] of Esau אַלּ֤וּף <WH441> duke תֵּימָן֙ <WH8487> Teman אַלּ֣וּף <WH441> duke אוֹמָ֔ר <WH201> Omar אַלּ֥וּף <WH441> duke צְפ֖וֹ <WH6825> Zepho אַלּ֥וּף <WH441> duke קְנַֽז׃ <WH7073> Kenaz

אַלּֽוּף־ <WH441> Duke קֹ֛רַח <WH7141> Korah אַלּ֥וּף <WH441> duke גַּעְתָּ֖ם <WH1609> Gatam אַלּ֣וּף <WH441> [and] duke עֲמָלֵ֑ק <WH6002> Amalek אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These אַלּוּפֵ֤י <WH441> these [are] the dukes אֱלִיפַז֙ <WH464> [that came] of Eliphaz בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> of Edom אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> these [were] the sons עָדָֽה׃ <WH5711> of Adah

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> And these [are] the sons רְעוּאֵל֙ <WH7467> of Reuel בֶּן־ <WH1121> son עֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> Esau's אַלּ֥וּף <WH441> duke נַ֙חַת֙ <WH5184> Nahath אַלּ֣וּף <WH441> duke זֶ֔רַח <WH2226> Zerah אַלּ֥וּף <WH441> duke שַׁמָּ֖ה <WH8048> Shammah אַלּ֣וּף <WH441> duke מִזָּ֑ה <WH4199> Mizzah אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These אַלּוּפֵ֤י <WH441> these [are] the dukes רְעוּאֵל֙ <WH7467> [that came] of Reuel בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> of Edom אֵ֕לֶּה <WH428> these בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> these [are] the sons בָשְׂמַ֖ת <WH1315> of Bashemath אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> wife עֵשָֽׂו׃ <WH6215> Esau's

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> And these [are] the sons אָהֳלִֽיבָמָה֙ <WH173> of Aholibamah אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife עֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> Esau's אַלּ֥וּף <WH441> duke יְע֛וּשׁ <WH3266> Jeush אַלּ֥וּף <WH441> duke יַעְלָ֖ם <WH3281> Jaalam אַלּ֣וּף <WH441> duke קֹ֑רַח <WH7141> Korah אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These אַלּוּפֵ֞י <WH441> these [were] the dukes אָֽהֳלִיבָמָ֛ה <WH173> [that came] of Aholibamah בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter עֲנָ֖ה <WH6034> of Anah אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> wife עֵשָֽׂו׃ <WH6215> Esau's

אֵ֧לֶּה <WH428> These בְנֵי־ <WH1121> These [are] the sons עֵשָׂ֛ו <WH6215> of Esau וְאֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> These אַלּוּפֵיהֶ֖ם <WH441> and these [are] their dukes ה֥וּא <WH1931> he אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> who [is] Edom ס

אֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> These בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> These [are] the sons שֵׂעִיר֙ <WH8165> of Seir הַחֹרִ֔י <WH2752> the Horite יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> who inhabited הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land לוֹטָ֥ן <WH3877> Lotan וְשׁוֹבָ֖ל <WH7732> and Shobal וְצִבְע֥וֹן <WH6649> and Zibeon וַעֲנָֽה׃ <WH6034> and Anah

וְדִשׁ֥וֹן <WH1787> And Dishon וְאֵ֖צֶר <WH687> and Ezer וְדִישָׁ֑ן <WH1789> and Dishan אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These אַלּוּפֵ֧י <WH441> these [are] the dukes הַחֹרִ֛י <WH2752> of the Horites בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children שֵׂעִ֖יר <WH8165> of Seir בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> of Edom

וַיִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> become בְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the children לוֹטָ֖ן <WH3877> of Lotan חֹרִ֣י <WH2753> were Hori וְהֵימָ֑ם <WH1967> and Hemam וַאֲח֥וֹת <WH269> sister לוֹטָ֖ן <WH3877> and Lotan's תִּמְנָֽע׃ <WH8555> [was] Timna

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children שׁוֹבָ֔ל <WH7732> of Shobal עַלְוָ֥ן <WH5935> [were] these Alvan וּמָנַ֖חַת <WH4506> and Manahath וְעֵיבָ֑ל <WH5858> and Ebal שְׁפ֖וֹ <WH8195> Shepho וְאוֹנָֽם׃ <WH208> and Onam

וְאֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> These בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And these [are] the children צִבְע֖וֹן <WH6649> of Zibeon וְאַיָּ֣ה <WH345> both Ajah וַעֲנָ֑ה <WH6034> and Anah ה֣וּא <WH1931> he עֲנָ֗ה <WH6034> this [was that] Anah אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who מָצָ֤א <WH4672> that found אֶת־ <WH853> הַיֵּמִם֙ <WH3222> the mules בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> in the wilderness בִּרְעֹת֥וֹ <WH7462> as he fed אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֲמֹרִ֖ים <WH2543> the asses לְצִבְע֥וֹן <WH6649> of Zibeon אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> his father

וְאֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> These בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children עֲנָ֖ה <WH6034> of Anah דִּשֹׁ֑ן <WH1787> [were] these Dishon וְאָהֳלִיבָמָ֖ה <WH173> and Aholibamah בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter עֲנָֽה׃ <WH6034> of Anah

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And these [are] the children דִישָׁ֑ן <WH1789> Dishon חֶמְדָּ֥ן <WH2533> Hemdan וְאֶשְׁבָּ֖ן <WH790> and Eshban וְיִתְרָ֥ן <WH3506> and Ithran וּכְרָֽן׃ <WH3763> and Cheran
אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> The children אֵ֑צֶר <WH687> of Ezer בִּלְהָ֥ן <WH1092> [are] these Bilhan וְזַעֲוָ֖ן <WH2190> and Zaavan וַעֲקָֽן׃ <WH6130> and Akan
אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> These בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> The children דִישָׁ֖ן <WH1789> of Dishan ע֥וּץ <WH5780> [are] these Uz וַאֲרָֽן׃ <WH765> and Aran

אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These אַלּוּפֵ֣י <WH441> These [are] the dukes הַחֹרִ֑י <WH2752> [that came] of the Horites אַלּ֤וּף <WH441> duke לוֹטָן֙ <WH3877> Lotan אַלּ֣וּף <WH441> duke שׁוֹבָ֔ל <WH7732> Shobal אַלּ֥וּף <WH441> duke צִבְע֖וֹן <WH6649> Zibeon אַלּ֥וּף <WH441> duke עֲנָֽה׃ <WH6034> Anah

אַלּ֥וּף <WH441> Duke דִּשֹׁ֛ן <WH1787> Dishon אַלּ֥וּף <WH441> duke אֵ֖צֶר <WH687> Ezer אַלּ֣וּף <WH441> duke דִּישָׁ֑ן <WH1789> Dishan אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These אַלּוּפֵ֧י <WH441> these [are] the dukes הַחֹרִ֛י <WH2753> [that came] of Hori לְאַלֻּפֵיהֶ֖ם <WH441> among their dukes בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land שֵׂעִֽיר׃ <WH8165> of Seir פ

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> now these הַמְּלָכִ֔ים <WH4428> And these [are] the kings אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who מָלְכ֖וּ <WH4427> that reigned בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land אֱד֑וֹם <WH123> of Edom לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before מְלָךְ־ <WH4427> there reigned מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> any king לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> over the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיִּמְלֹ֣ךְ <WH4427> reigned בֶּאֱד֔וֹם <WH123> in Edom בֶּ֖לַע <WH1106> And Bela בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בְּע֑וֹר <WH1160> of Beor וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> and the name עִיר֖וֹ <WH5892> of his city דִּנְהָֽבָה׃ <WH1838> [was] Dinhabah

וַיָּ֖מָת <WH4191> died בָּ֑לַע <WH1106> And Bela וַיִּמְלֹ֣ךְ <WH4427> reigned תַּחְתָּ֔יו <WH8478> his place יוֹבָ֥ב <WH3103> and Jobab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son זֶ֖רַח <WH2226> of Zerah מִבָּצְרָֽה׃ <WH1224> of Bozrah

וַיָּ֖מָת <WH4191> died יוֹבָ֑ב <WH3103> And Jobab וַיִּמְלֹ֣ךְ <WH4427> reigned תַּחְתָּ֔יו <WH8478> his place חֻשָׁ֖ם <WH2367> and Husham מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> of the land הַתֵּימָנִֽי׃ <WH8489> of Temani

וַיָּ֖מָת <WH4191> died שַׂמְלָ֑ה <WH8072> And Samlah וַיִּמְלֹ֣ךְ <WH4427> reigned תַּחְתָּ֔יו <WH8478> his place שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> and Saul מֵרְחֹב֥וֹת <WH7344> of Rehoboth הַנָּהָֽר׃ <WH5104> [by] the river

וַיָּ֖מָת <WH4191> died שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> And Saul וַיִּמְלֹ֣ךְ <WH4427> reigned תַּחְתָּ֔יו <WH8478> his place בַּ֥עַל חָנָ֖ן <WH1177> and Baalhanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַכְבּֽוֹר׃ <WH5907> of Achbor

וְ֠אֵלֶּה <WH428> now these שְׁמ֞וֹת <WH8034> And these [are] the names אַלּוּפֵ֤י <WH441> of the dukes עֵשָׂו֙ <WH6215> [that came] of Esau לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֔ם <WH4940> according to their families לִמְקֹמֹתָ֖ם <WH4725> after their places בִּשְׁמֹתָ֑ם <WH8034> by their names אַלּ֥וּף <WH441> duke תִּמְנָ֛ע <WH8555> Timnah אַלּ֥וּף <WH441> duke עַֽלְוָ֖ה <WH5933> Alvah אַלּ֥וּף <WH441> duke יְתֵֽת׃ <WH3509> Jetheth
